amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit federal funding for the Countering Extremist Activity Working Group or implement any recommendations from the group.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 206 (Roll no. 272).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 206 (Roll no. 272).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
